divs: sighting detailsi was outside smoking a cigarrete with my brother, im 19 he's 30,he was looking up, then said, "what the f*** was that?" i looked up and he pointed out what looked like a small star, it wasnt twinkling\flashing, and it was too far up to be a plane. it moved at a steady pace in a straight line until it was no longer visible.
Summary: outside with brother, starlike object, non-blinking, too high for plane,straight line till out of sight
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Owensboro
There were no other sightings in Owensboro on or around December 21st 2012
